CustomField.description: This field shows either the Samples (Total) formula field used on Single Institution records OR the Samples (Total) roll up summary used on Multi Institution records
CustomField.formula: IF( Samples_Total_RollUp__c != 0 || Samples_Total_RollUp__c != null, Samples_Total_RollUp__c, Samples_Total__c )
CustomField.label: Total # Committed
